message.name: ERR_CODE_101
message.locale: A problem occurred when attempting to add a stack, please try again. If this problem persists please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_CODE_102
message.locale: A problem occurred when attempting to modify a stack, please try again. If this problem persists please contact your system administrator

message.name: ERR_CODE_103
message.locale: A problem occurred when attempting to remove a stack, please try again. If this problem persists please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_CODE_104
message.locale: A problem occurred when attempting to contact the server for updates. If this problem persists please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_CODE_105
message.locale: A problem occurred when attempting to retrieve the display data, please try to reload this page. If this problem persists please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_STACK_NAME_NOT_UNIQUE
message.locale: A stack already exists with this name! Please attempt add the stack using a unique name.

message.name: ERR_STACK_NAME_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: A stack name must have a least one character! Please attempt to add the stack using a valid name.
